name: Odysseas Pavlidis
description:
Odysseas Pavlidis is the Director of Client Success at MINUTTIA, an Organic Growth acceleration agency for B2B SaaS companies. He has an unending interest in acquiring new knowledge.
[social_for_odysseas_bio]
